summary: Hope Thanos doesn’t find these 😆 #photography #avengersinfinitywar #avengers #avengersendgame #funny #glove...
Spider-Man - Hunt For The Amulet
title: Spider-Man - Hunt For The Amulet
body:
Tony sends Peter on a mission to Rio De Janeiro to find and recruit a girl named Ava Ayala. But when he gets there, a lot of trouble happens when a power-hungry hunter is after her as well. Follows the MCU Timeline. Takes place a month after The Clash of The Avengers.

New Mission

(Peter’s POV)“Ned…Ned, you there buddy?"I say lightly patting my friend on the cheek."I had a crazy dream,” he groaned,“ We were at your house and Tony Stark was there.” He must’ve been so shocked…

Read more…

summary: The fact it’s over? *chuckles* Just kidding. About 2018, I loved how my relationship with Wong evolved. He used to be always so...
body:
The fact it’s over? *chuckles* Just kidding.
About 2018, I loved how my relationship with Wong evolved. He used to be always so serious all the time, I’m glad I succeeded at making him smoother.

I love when he smiles, and now he does it quite often. I also love biting his tuna melts and sharing ice cream with him, it’s always fun to spend some time together. Wong’s still super serious when it’s about training, but I guess that’s his natural.

reblog.comment:

Rhodey: Sober

summary: Proof that only Tony Stark can kill/hurt/maim Tony Stark
body:
Proof that only Tony Stark can kill/hurt/maim Tony Stark

Iron Man: Tony is hurt by, and nearly dies from, a weapon that he designed.

Iron Man 2: Tony is hurt by a technology that he weaponised first — the arc reactor was functionally useless until Tony made it smaller and turned it into a power source for the Iron Man suit. Vanko followed suit and powered the Whiplash suit.

Iron Man 3: Tony is attacked by supersoldiers who were created using a formula that he helped Maya Hansen complete. He left the equation behind his name tag at the start.

Avengers: Tony almost dies inside a deep space portal that was initially powered by his tech. The arc reactor powering Stark Towers helped kickstart the process before the space stone becomes self-sustaining.

Avengers: Age of Ultron: Tony almost dies at the hands of a murderbot that he helped design. (Let’s be clear: Ultron’s winning personality came from the mind stone but Tony’s, and Bruce’s, work on the Ultron Project provided the blue print)

Avengers: Infinity War: Tony almost dies after being stabbed with a weapon he designed — going back full circle to Iron Man.

(Note: I left out Civil War because I don’t believe Steve was, at any point in time, trying to kill Tony. You can wank all about it, if you want in your own posts; leave mine alone)

blog.name: spideyscnse
blog.title: surfing the web
blog.description: lia. fanfic writer. (requests open !) “i have nothing to prove to you.” masterlist

summary: Masterlist AVENGERS Headcanons/Other Randoms Nursery Rhymes with the Avengers Can we fix Buck Eye see what you did there Life is...
body:
Masterlist

AVENGERS

Headcanons/Other Randoms

Nursery Rhymes with the Avengers

Can we fix Buck

Eye see what you did there

Life is like a computer

Apple Cider Man

Armed

Good Parker

Apologize

Handstand

Internet

Avocado

peter why did you-

In Endgame

PETER PARKER

Oneshots

One More Second - Fluff/Angst

Y/N grew up with the Avengers. But when fighting alongside Peter Parker, in space, she realises that heroes don’t always have to be brave, but one second of bravery could save hundreds.

Proper Doctor - Fluff

When Peter shows up at Y/N’s window halfway through the night, she, luckily, has some healing abilities and can lend a hand.

Spider Speaker - Fluff

During an accident in the lab, Y/N gains the ability to communicate with bugs. Tony thinks this will come in handy when he goes to to recruit a boy called Peter Parker, who just happens to be Spiderman.

Exactly like a date - Fluff

Peter needs Y/N’s help to finish homework due the next day. This results in a long, late-night study session over at his house.

Told You So - Fluff

Y/N, Peter’s girlfriend, encounters Spiderman one evening while with her friends, who claims that he needs her help. Amused, Y/N lets him swing her back to Stark Tower. When he explains the problem, she can’t help but find it terribly cute.

Last Memory - Fluff/Angst

Y/N was there all the way. From when they were kids, to when Peter was recruited by Tony Stark. All the way. All the way to the very end.

Red and Blue - Fluff/Angst

One sleepy night, when both Peter and you are tired of studying for tomorrow’s Chemistry exam, you suddenly realise how extraordinary Peter would look with painted nails.

One sleepy night, when both Peter and you are tired of studying for tomorrow’s Chemistry exam, you suddenly realise how extraordinary Peter would look with painted nails.

summary: 30 Minutes
title: 30 Minutes
body:
You are certain you love the man who will soon be your husband, right?

Plans Or Mistakes

You closed and locked the door behind you in the small room. You were immediately assaulted by hands, mouth and a body that pressed you hard against the wall.“How long until the party starts?” You…

Read more…
